heading: HR02291
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE PROTECTIONS GRANTED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT, PHILIPPINE OVERSEAS EMPLOYMENT ADMINISTRATION, OVERSEAS WORKERS WELFARE ADMINISTRATION, DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, AND THE MARITIME INDUSTRY  AUTHORITY AGAINST THE ABANDONMENT OF SEAFARERS IN LIGHT OF THE ABANDONMENT OF THE 21 FILIPINO SEAFARERS IN KAKINADA PORT, INDIA
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-11-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02291
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE PROTECTIONS GRANTED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT, PHILIPPINE OVERSEAS EMPLOYMENT ADMINISTRATION, OVERSEAS WORKERS WELFARE ADMINISTRATION, DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, AND THE MARITIME INDUSTRY AUTHORITY AGAINST THE ABANDONMENT OF SEAFARERS IN LIGHT OF THE ABANDONMENT OF THE 21 FILIPINO SEAFARERS IN KAKINADA PORT, INDIA
